instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1989: What is A1989? A1989 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2018, 2019 with EMC 3124, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00850..
definitions.820-00850: What is 820-00850? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT: What is PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT? PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT is a power rail that powers the LED light in the screen of the device that allows you to see what is on the screen. When this is low or missing, the screen will be dim..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1989</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> (<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>) - No image / no green light (caps lock key)
threads.message:
Hi,

I have here an <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1989</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> (<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>) with a water damage on J8500 between PIN 1 , 3 and 43.

Note:
<SIGNAL>EDP_INT_AUX_N</SIGNAL> is shorted to ground - so I guess the onboard GPU got fried by the backlight circuit (<SIGNAL>PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT</SIGNAL>), right?

I was able to restore the device via AC2 - no issue.

But im not able to get an output on an external screen and the green light on caps lock key is also not working.

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1989</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> (<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00850</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>) - No image / no green light (caps lock key)
threads.message:
This board doesn't have discrete GPU, only iGPU.
So dead CPU...
